index_avg_drain_rate.help: Average number of documents indexed per second, for this index

index_avg_item_size.help: Average size of the indexed items, for this index
index_avg_item_size.notes: It is the encoded size of the index data divided by number of indexed items.

index_avg_scan_latency.help: Average latency observed by the index scans, for this index
index_avg_scan_latency.notes: This metric represents the latency observed by the index service, and not by user application. For consistent scans, latency includes request's wait time until a consistent snapshot is available.

index_cache_hits.help: Number of times the required index page is found in memory, for this index
index_cache_hits.notes: This metric is valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_cache_misses.help: Number of times the required index page is NOT found in memory, for this index
index_cache_misses.notes: This metric is valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_data_size.help: The approximate size of the valid uncompressed index data, for this index

index_data_size_on_disk.help: The size of the valid compressed index data, for this index
index_data_size_on_disk.notes: This metric is valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_disk_size.help: Total disk space taken up by this index, after compression. This includes index data files, checkpoints etc.
index_disk_size.notes: For standard GSI indexes, more than one index can share the actual disk files. In such cases, this metric represents the approximate disk size for each index.

index_frag_percent.help: Percentage of invalid index data, for this index
index_frag_percent.notes: This metric is valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_items_count.help: The actual number of items present in the latest index snapshot, for this index

index_log_space_on_disk.help: The size of the index data files - including garbage, for this index
index_log_space_on_disk.notes: The index data files store the compressed data. This metric is valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_memory_used.help: The memory used by this index

index_num_docs_indexed.help: Number of document updates (of type insert, modify, delete) observed by this index

index_num_docs_pending.help: Number of pending updates that are yet to be received by index service, for this index
index_num_docs_pending.notes: This metric includes the user triggered update, internal metadata updates, transaction updates etc.

index_num_docs_queued.help: Number of updates queued (but not yet processed) by index service, for this index
index_num_docs_queued.notes: This metric includes the user triggered update, internal metadata updates, transaction updates etc.

index_num_requests.help: Number of scan requests received by the index service, for this index
index_num_requests.notes: One query can contribute to more than one index scan requests (in case of sub-queries, joins etc.)

index_num_rows_returned.help: Number of rows/index entries returned as the scan result during index scans, for this index
index_num_rows_returned.notes: As index service supports filters, limits and aggregations, index service may return only a subset of rows/entries that are being scanned.

index_num_rows_scanned.help: Number of rows/index entries read during the index scans, for this index
index_num_rows_scanned.notes: As index service supports filters, limits and aggregations, index service may return only a subset of rows/entries that are being scanned.

index_raw_data_size.help: Encoded, uncompressed size of the index data, for this index
index_raw_data_size.notes: This metric does not include storage overheads due to fragmentation, MVCC snapshots etc.

index_recs_in_mem.help: Number of index entries cached in memory, for this index
index_recs_in_mem.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_recs_on_disk.help: Number of index entries stored on disk, which are not cached in memory, for this index
index_recs_on_disk.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_resident_percent.help: Ratio of records in memory to total records, for this index
index_resident_percent.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_scan_bytes_read.help: Number of bytes read from the index storage during index scans, for this index
index_scan_bytes_read.notes: This metric does not includes the index data which not returned as scan result.

index_total_scan_duration.help: Total time taken by the scans requests, for this index
index_total_scan_duration.notes: Total scan duration includes the time taken for index scan, as well as time for which scan request was waiting for a consistent snapshot to be available.

index_num_items_flushed.help: Number of documents written from memory to index storage

index_disk_bytes.help: Number of bytes read from and written to disk, including insert, get, and delete operations

index_memory_used_total.help: Total memory used by the indexer process

index_memory_quota.help: Configured memory quota for the index service nodes

index_num_indexes.help: Total number of indexes, located on this node

index_num_storage_instances.help: Total number of storage instances, located on this node
index_num_storage_instances.notes: For partitioned indexes with replicas, for an index, more than one instance can reside on a single node.

index_avg_resident_percent.help: Average resident percent across all indexes, located on this node
index_avg_resident_percent.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_avg_mutation_rate.help: Sum of mutation rates of all indexes, located on this node

index_total_drain_rate.help: Sum of drain rate of all indexes, located on this node

index_avg_disk_bps.help: Sum of disk bytes written per second, of all indexes, located on this node
index_avg_disk_bps.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_total_data_size.help: Sum of data size of all indexes, located on this node

index_total_disk_size.help: Sum of disk size of all indexes, located on this node

index_memory_used_storage.help: Amount of memory used by underlying index storage, on this node

index_memory_total_storage.help: Amount of memory used by the index memory allocator, on this node
index_memory_total_storage.notes: Index services uses a memory allocator named jemalloc. This metric reports the in-use memory by this allocator.

index_total_requests.help: Sum of number of requests received by all indexes, located on this node

index_total_rows_returned.help: Sum of number of rows returned during index scan across all indexes, located on this node

index_total_rows_scanned.help: Sum of number of rows scanned during index scans across all indexes, located on this node

index_memory_rss.help: Resident set size of the indexer process, running on this node

index_total_mutation_queue_size.help: Total number of index updates queued in the mutation queues, on this node

index_total_pending_scans.help: Sum of number of pending scans across all indexes, located on this node

index_heap_in_use.help: Total heap memory in use by indexer process in the node
index_heap_in_use.notes: This does not include the actual index pages, but it includes the Golang memory overheads required for index maintenance

index_total_raw_data_size.help: Sum of encoded, uncompressed size of the index data across all indexes, located on this node

index_net_avg_scan_rate.help: Average index scan rate across all indexes, for this node

index_storage_current_quota.help: Plasma's internally active memory quota for this node. It is tuned by memtuner.
index_storage_current_quota.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_heap_limit.help: Plasma's global heap limit for managed memory for this node
index_storage_heap_limit.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_memory_stats_size_page.help: Aggregated number of bytes of memory currently in use by Plasma for page records
index_storage_memory_stats_size_page.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_reclaim_pending_global.help: Aggregated number of bytes across all plasma instances which have been freed but not yet returned to OS
index_storage_reclaim_pending_global.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_num_pages.help: Aggregated number of pages that are currently in use
index_storage_num_pages.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_items_count.help: Aggregated number of items that are currently in the stores
index_storage_items_count.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_avg_item_size.help: Ratio of total item size and total records
index_storage_avg_item_size.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_purges.help: Aggregated number of times various pages are compacted due to the MVCCPurger being triggered
index_storage_purges.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_lss_used_space.help: Total number of bytes used by data and recovery logs
index_storage_lss_used_space.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_lss_fragmentation.help: The fraction of garbage data present in the logs
index_storage_lss_fragmentation.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_lss_num_reads.help: Total number of times an LSS(both data and recovery) block is read from disk into memory
index_storage_lss_num_reads.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_lss_blk_read_bs.help: Total number of bytes that were read from disc into memory from the logs(both data and recovery)
index_storage_lss_blk_read_bs.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_rlss_num_reads.help: Total number of times an LSS block was read into memory due to index scans
index_storage_rlss_num_reads.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_lss_blk_rdr_reads_bs.help: Total number of bytes that were read from disc into memory from the logs(both data and recovery) for index scans
index_storage_lss_blk_rdr_reads_bs.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_lookup_num_reads.help: Total number of LSS lookups for looking up items from stores
index_storage_lookup_num_reads.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_lookup_blk_reads_bs.help: Total number of bytes that were read from disc into memory for lookups
index_storage_lookup_blk_reads_bs.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_bytes_written.help: Aggregated total of bytes written to the disc(data and recovery)
index_storage_bytes_written.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_bytes_incoming.help: Aggregated total of bytes that are added to the stores and intended to be written on disc
index_storage_bytes_incoming.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_resident_ratio.help: Ratio of cached records and total records
index_storage_resident_ratio.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_compression_ratio.help: Ratio of cumulative number of page bytes compressed and cumulative number of page bytes after compression
index_storage_compression_ratio.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_num_burst_visits.help: Aggregated total of pages visited during burst eviction
index_storage_num_burst_visits.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_num_periodic_visits.help: Aggregated total of pages visited during periodic eviction
index_storage_num_periodic_visits.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_num_evicted.help: Aggregated total of the number of pages that were evicted and persisted to disc
index_storage_num_evicted.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_num_evictable.help: Aggregated total of the number of pages can be compressed
index_storage_num_evictable.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_cleaner_num_reads.help: Total of number of cleaner log reads (both data and recovery)
index_storage_cleaner_num_reads.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.

index_storage_cleaner_blk_read_bs.help: Total of number bytes read for cleaner log reads (both data and recovery)
index_storage_cleaner_blk_read_bs.notes: Valid only for standard GSI indexes.
